attributes.action: Changing of divorce laws where children are present.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change divorce laws so that no couple with children can get decree nisi until both parties have agreed on a plan (In writing , with a solicitor or Judge as witness) for both parents to have pre-planned access to children after divorce. (Unless one party has been convicted of child abuse or cruelty) Whichever party breaks this promise should be brought to justice without question. We all owe our children this!!!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Family-equality/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
